participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, enjoys expressing herself through music and cooking.
participant_1.background: I will continue to play music with my friends to help relieve stress and enjoy myself. I try to keep in touch with my family, but I can be busy with school and my job. I enjoy cooking but not baking. I can speak Arabic, English, and French. My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.

participant_2.name: Nathan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, loves exploring new ideas and cherishes family memories.
participant_2.background: I loved riding horses with my father when I was a child. I enjoy reading my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekend. I want to learn more about the science behind how gummy worms are made. I was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years. I still call my ex-boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special.

content.text: What's a fun thing you do to relieve stress?
I love to read my favorite book, Anne of Green Gables, on the weekends. It's so calming and peaceful.
I can see why! It's such a classic. What do you like about it the most?
I love the characters and the setting. It's so peaceful and beautiful.
I've never read it, but I've heard great things! I might have to check it out.
I highly recommend it! It's a great book to curl up with on a rainy day.
Do you have any other hobbies or interests that help you relieve stress?
I also like to cook. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I love to cook too! It's so therapeutic.
What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes. They're so easy and delicious.
I love pasta too! My favorite is spaghetti with meatballs.
That's a classic! I love it too.
It's so good. I could eat it every day!
Me too! I'm getting hungry just thinking about it.
Me too! I think I'm going to make some spaghetti for dinner tonight.
That sounds great! I might have to join you.
